definition: to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: Even the top gourmand can't eat so much food.
sentences.chinese: 即使最贪吃的人也吃不下这么多东西啊。

sentences.english: The newts are very gluttonous but rather dovish!
sentences.chinese: 这些蝾螈非常的贪吃但是它们也是相当有节制的。

sentences.english: I now but gluttonous, how be to return a responsibility?
sentences.chinese: 我现在可贪吃了，是怎么回事啊？

sentences.english: I've never met a man as gluttonous as him.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没遇到过河他一样贪吃的人。

sentences.english: It is gluttonous, likes sleeping also likes playing.
sentences.chinese: 它非常贪吃，爱睡觉也爱玩耍。

sentences.english: But if a person is a feaster, scientists believe they produce less of the gut hormone.
sentences.chinese: 但科学家认为，贪吃型暴食者分泌的这种荷尔蒙更少。

sentences.english: DECAY】Her teeth decayed because she ate too many sweets.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿因贪吃甜食而蛀坏。

sentences.english: You should not eat so greedily.
This is a simple Snake game.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个简单的贪吃蛇游戏。

sentences.english: Pigs are known for being fat, gluttonous and lazy.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知猪是很胖，贪吃而且懒懒惰的。

sentences.english: Ravenous beasts freely roved up and down the country.
sentences.chinese: 贪吃的野兽随意出没在乡间。

sentences.english: I am specially like eating, also special gluttonous .
sentences.chinese: 我就是特别喜欢吃，也特别的贪吃。

sentences.english: Images for the Nibbles game can be downloaded here .
sentences.chinese: 其中，贪吃蛇游戏的图像文件可以从这里下载。

sentences.english: He's so gluttonous that he can never stop eating half full.
sentences.chinese: 他那个人特别贪吃，从来没有吃半饱的时候。

sentences.english: Her teeth decayed because she ate too many sweets.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿因贪吃甜食而蛀坏。

sentences.english: We're like gluttonous kids on Halloween with a big pile of candy.
sentences.chinese: 我们就像万圣节前夕贪吃的孩子，捧着一大堆的糖果。

definition: to only want to have a good time/to just want to have fun, and to shy away from self-discipline
to eat on the sly/to pilfer food/to be unfaithful
